aima.core.search.framework
Interface PerceptToStateFunction

All Known Implementing Classes:
FullyObservableVacuumEnvironmentPerceptToStateFunction
public interface PerceptToStateFunction

This interface is to define how to Map a Percept to a State representation for a problem solver within a specific environment. This arises in the description of the Online Search algorithms from Chapter 4.

Author:
Ciaran O'Reilly

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object getState(Percept p)
          Get the problem state associated with a Percept.
 

Method Detail

getState

java.lang.Object getState(Percept p)
Get the problem state associated with a Percept.

Parameters:
p - the percept to be transformed to a problem state.
Returns:
a problem state derived from the Percept p.
